help-file.title: FLIGHT
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Enchantment
"Flight" will allow you to fly around wherever you want, regardless of terrain.
Warning: If your spell expires while you are high in the air, the fall will hurt or kill you. This could result in the possibility of an irretrievable corpse.
